title: Medialink USB Bluetooth Adapter - Version 4.0 (Newest Available) Class 2 Smart Ready Adapter with Low Energy Technology - Compatible with Windows 8 / Windows 7 / Windows Vista
description: Medialink USB Bluetooth AdapterAllows a PC or laptop to wirelessly communicate with Bluetooth-enabled devices, like a Smartphone, tablet, keyboard, mouse, speaker, printer or headset. Share files, stream music, video chat, print & more from up to 30FT away (Bluetooth abilities vary by device). Low energy technology consumes little power from your PC/laptop, so it’s safe to keep the adapter connected when idle. Simplistically designed so even novice users have no issue. At about the size of a postage stamp, it won’t block extra ports. Backwards compatible with earlier Bluetooth versions.Product Features- Enables a PC/laptop to wirelessly communicate with Bluetooth devices up to 30FT away- Easy setup with attractive user interface- Latest version 4.0 class 2 smart ready adapter with low energy technology- Backwards compatible with earlier Bluetooth versionsSpecifications- CPU speed: 200MHz or above- Memory: 64MB or above (128MB recommended)- Hard drive free space: 250MB- Interface: USB V1.1 / 2.0- Broadcom chipset- Power: DC 5V from host- Connection speeds of 3 MbpsCompatibility- PC’s/laptops running 32/64-bit Windows 8, 7 & Vista- Bluetooth-enabled devices, like Smartphones, tablets, keyboards, mice, speakers, printers, headsets & more- Not compatible with Windows XP, Mac or USB 3.0InstallationInsert the adapter & the included CD, which prompts to install the device & pair (connect) with other Bluetooth devices in minutesWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
